item.title: The 32 Best Deals at Walmart’s Competing Prime Day Sale
item.description: Walmart is competing with Amazon this Prime Day, offering great savings on our favorite laptops, 4K TVs, earbuds, and other WIRED favorites.

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI's AGI Fight Is Bigger Than a Contract
item.description: A key clause in Microsoft and OpenAI's deal embodies the raging divide between AGI true believers and those who think it's still a long ways off.

item.title: 8 Best USB Hubs (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Ditch the dongles. These multiport USB hubs will maximize your connectivity options.
